Interface SeguitoRepository

@Repository public interface SeguitoRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Seguiti,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • findSeguito

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM `seguiti` WHERE `seguito` = :altroId AND `seguace` = :mioId", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Seguiti> findSeguito(int mioId, int altroId)
      This method is used to find a Seguiti entity where the 'seguito' and 'seguace' match the provided ids.
      Parameters:
      mioId - This is the id of the 'seguace'.
      altroId - This is the id of the 'seguito'.
      Returns:
      Optional This returns the Seguiti entity if it exists.

    • numeroSeguaci

      @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `seguiti` WHERE `seguito` = :mioId", nativeQuery=true) int numeroSeguaci(int mioId)
      This method is used to count the number of 'seguiti' where the 'seguito' matches the provided id.
      Parameters:
      mioId - This is the id of the 'seguito'.
      Returns:
      int This returns the count of 'seguiti'.

    • daChiVengoSeguito

      @Query(value="SELECT s.seguito, u.username, s.amico, r.role, (SELECT COUNT(s1.id) FROM seguiti s1 WHERE s1.seguito = u.id ) as follower, (SELECT COUNT(s1.id) FROM seguiti s1 WHERE s1.seguace = u.id ) as following FROM seguiti s JOIN utente u ON s.seguito = u.id JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id WHERE s.seguito = :mioId ", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> daChiVengoSeguito(@Param("mioId") Integer mioId)
      This method is used to find a list of users who follow the user with the provided id.
      Parameters:
      mioId - This is the id of the user.
      Returns:
      Listinvalid input: '<'Object[]> This returns a list of users who follow the user with the provided id.

    • chiSeguo

      @Query(value="SELECT s.seguito, u.username, s.amico, r.role, (SELECT COUNT(s1.id) FROM seguiti s1 WHERE s1.seguito = u.id ) as follower, (SELECT COUNT(s1.id) FROM seguiti s1 WHERE s1.seguace = u.id ) as following FROM seguiti s JOIN utente u ON s.seguito = u.id JOIN roles r ON r.id = u.role_id WHERE s.seguace = :mioId ", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> chiSeguo(@Param("mioId") Integer mioId)
      This method is used to find a list of users that the user with the provided id is following.
      Parameters:
      mioId - This is the id of the user.
      Returns:
      Listinvalid input: '<'Object[]> This returns a list of users that the user with the provided id is following.
